Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory519.png'}

{1: '1', 3: 'After confirming the coordinates of the base, Bianca ordered the rest of her team to infiltrate from different exits to eliminate the guards, while Bianca herself and Karenina entered deep into the base.'}
{3: 'The base was already partly abandoned but still held some clues that were valuable to them.'}
{3: 'The long hallway was empty with no one else but Karenina and Bianca, and the only thing they could hear were their own footsteps.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina, sorry. I should have told you earlier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I mean, it wasn't even something embarrassing to bring up anyway.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca was the one to break the awkward silence.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I sort of guessed it already, from talking with the guys from the Engineering Force.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "So I understand where you're coming from.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But that doesn't mean I'm not mad!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...I totally get that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina, you see...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The siren suddenly started blasting off and the entire hallway started flashing in red.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Looks like they're in trouble. Let's hurry.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory108.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory108.png'}
{3: "Following the map she's modeled off her surroundings using her terminal, Bianca quickly finds the main lab located in the deepest part of the base."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I don't have enough computing power to unlock these electronic locks...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Stand back. It'll be over in a second!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Karenina's cannon begins lighting up as its temperature increases. Following a loud bang, a large hole melts through the lab door."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Cough... cough, cough...', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory648.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory648.jpg'}

{3: 'After the smoke disperses, Karenina ducks through the hole to find a room lit by only one emergency light and an emaciated researcher calculating something with a pen and paper in front of a terminal.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "No, that didn't work... Another failure... and another one... None of the equations worked, and none of the data from before worked...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Damn it... we're out of time here. Gotta go through all the equations again... I'm sure... I'm sure I'll spot what went wrong in there...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina froze in shock. It'd been so long since she heard that voice."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "So it's him...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Wise Gale, former researcher of the Science Council, please cease all actions at once, raise your hands above your head, and turn around so I can see your eyes!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bianca raises her bow and aims at Wise's back."}
{1: '1', 3: "Like a test taker who's heard the call to submit the test, Wise stops cold, his fountain pen falling from his hand and clattering as it landed on the floor."}
{2: 'Wise', 3: '...Is it all over now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Regaining his composure and putting his hands behind his head, Wise turned around quietly and looked at Karenina and Bianca, who were staring at him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wise... What in the world...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina looks at Wise incredulously. The man, aloof and indifferent, seems entirely unfazed seeing Karenina.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What in the world are you doing here?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You've been on the Purifying Force's wanted list since your disappearance from Babylonia, Wise Gale. Never thought we'd run into you here of all places.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What are you doing here? Who is funding this ground base?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Answer me, Wise!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'In a fit of rage, Karenina flung away the cannon she was holding, blasting a giant crater on the wall of the lab.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wise', 3: 'Karenina... Haha, oh boy. Seems like God is pulling some sort of bad joke on me here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'I see he\'s trying to force me to believe "fate" at a time like this.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Why are you trying to stage a rebellion with the Engineering Force's Constructs—when you were Professor Kalon's last student and belonged to the Cosmos Technicians Union?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "Let me get this straight. I'm not interested in manipulating people. It's the world that sent them down that path, and that's that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'I am only using the equipment and data here to finish what was unfinished.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What are you—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You were Grandpa's student...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why didn't you tell me any of this?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The series of shocking events is making Karenina very irritable, but she tries to suppress her welling emotions, hoping that Wise will give her an explanation.'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "Calm down, Karenina. Remember what I told you? Anger doesn't change a thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "I'm doing all of these precisely because I was one of Professor Kalon's students.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "I should have died a long time ago, and I'm the very definition of mediocre.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Wise', 3: 'And that\'s why they didn\'t pick me for Professor Kalon\'s last experiment. Everyone else was picked—and they gave their lives for "that experiment." And what happened to Professor Kalon is history.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'The world never remembers their names... when they gave their lives for Babylonia, for Earth... and for humanity itself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'I was trying to finish what they started, except the Science Council stopped me from going further.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'Which is why I was left with no choice but to count on people outside Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "They stopped you only because they didn't want anyone exposed to any risk from the experiment, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'Is that right? Well, that might sound reasonable enough, except nothing will ever stand in the way of science.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "Scientists are humanity's offerings for scientific research—and that's a fact that we've all accepted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "And this is a path you'll eventually find yourself walking down, Karenina, because you're talented—to the point that I'm honestly jealous of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "They've wiped out everything about Professor Kalon, but you'll come across that sooner or later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "I saw it as my duty to take you into Professor Kalon's place and raise you to live up to his expectations... because he was the one who adopted you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'And looking back now... that was pretty much the only thing I was able to do.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...That's not true, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're wrong, Wise. You are wrong about everything!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Grandpa didn't adopt me to raise me to become some scientist. He never expected anything from me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'He was just rescuing a girl who was starving to death and wanted her to grow up healthy and happy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Whether it\'s "Grandpa\'s little girl," or "Karenina of the Engineering Force," I chose these identities myself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Grandpa taught me the power of science, but how that power should be used is up to me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "So don't you talk like you know everything. I've always hated that about you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And... none of the things you did were "insignificant."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You have no reason to do this to yourself!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "...Karenina, you're only saying what you're saying because you've never experienced the things I have.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "We're usually not the ones making decisions for our lives because the world does that for us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'You cannot feel the pull from the sun, but its force is acting on you constantly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'But even without you, Earth orbits the sun all the same.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "Even if you realize this, there's nothing you can do about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'In the end, humans can only follow the "pulling force" toward their destined end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'You will have to face it one day. When that day comes, you\'ll understand the "fate" that burdens us as scientists and the regret for not fulfilling it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...What exactly does that mean?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina gnashes her teeth in anger, emitting scraping sounds.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm never going to ****ing understand any of that!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I never understood and will never understand. Ever!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't get why you are doing all of this. I can't wrap my head around it and I never will!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'If that day does come, I won\'t submit to that "pulling force."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I will follow my heart and choose the path for myself.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina declares in a firm tone, drawing a clear line from the philosophy of her past mentor.'}
{3: 'Wise suddenly starts twitching in pain as he starts spitting out black blood onto the ground in a coughing fit, driving him reeling to his feet.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait, are you...?!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Karenina finally realizes that Wise is infected with the Punishing Virus. Red blotches creep up the arteries on his neck—a sign that he's in the final stage of his infection."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Bianca, serum! Did you bring any serum?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'No, but if we get it from the nearest supply station—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wise', 3: "Don't waste your time. I know it when death is near. Serum won't do anything.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "Our experiments didn't yield any results. They've abandoned the base and abandoned me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'I wanted to give it one last shot before my life faded, but it was no use.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Wise maintains the same expressionless face, the flame of life long gone from the scientist's eyes."}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'I will give you one last warning.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: "If it didn't take you much to find this place, that means you have fallen into their trap.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Bianca didn't ask for an explanation after hearing Wise's warning. Her intuition tells her that something bad is about to happen."}
{3: 'The alarm continues growing louder as Bianca pulls out her terminal.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Attention to everyone on the Purifying Force, evacuate from this area at once!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Bianca, we need to get him out!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The last word Wise leaves for Karenina is in the same solemn tone he always spoke in.'}
{2: 'Wise', 3: 'Let me go see them as a human.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She clenches her cannon, trembling, unable to hold it up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '...May god bless your soul.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With a swoosh past Karenina's ear, an arrow puts the scientist out of his suffering."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karenina, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca grabs Karenina by hand and leads her out of this hellish place.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory294.png'}
{3: 'Then, with an ear-splitting explosion and a wave of inferno, the entire base is blown into pieces.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Half a month later.'}
{1: '1', 3: "In the Purifying Force Captain's office, Bianca is preparing a mission report on her terminal."}
{3: 'She fills in the "casualty number" at the end and stares at the terrible report for a moment before submitting it to Babylonia\'s cloud database.'}
{3: "She sits silently for a moment and, just as she's about to leave, the door opens."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Boy, this place sure is big. So this is what a captain's office is like!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But it won't be long until I get one of my own. I wonder how much material I can fit in here...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina scans the room and begins measuring its dimensions with her fingers.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Is there anything you need?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '"Is there anything you need?" I haven\'t seen you for a few days and we\'re strangers now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I thought you were still angry at me.', 4: '1'}
{3: "They haven't seen each other at all since that mission on the ground."}
{3: 'Half a month may pass quickly, but is enough time for many thoughts and emotions to be sorted out.'}
{3: 'Bianca has been avoiding Karenina a little because in her mind, some of the things she did have hurt Karenina.'}
{3: 'She never told Karenina about being in the Purifying Force because it might bring some misunderstanding into their relationship.'}
{3: 'But deep down, her "mistrust" of those around her is the real reason she tries so hard to protect this friendship.'}
{3: 'She took the initiative to reach out to Karenina, to invite Karenina to step out of her closed-off shell.'}
{3: 'But at the same time, she herself is stuck in her own shell, too.'}
{3: "Bianca doesn't know how to face Karenina after realizing this."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I was mad at you, and I was also trying not to think about Wise...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Karenina has her hands on her hips, lowering her head and looking up again. Then she closes her eyes and takes a deep breath as if she's working up something."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But in the end, I feel like none of it matters.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She says this with a smile on her face.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What's more important is that there's a voice in my head telling me...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That if I don't come to see you now, I might regret it for the rest of my life.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That doesn't mean I've let it go, but if I keep immersing myself in those thoughts, I can't move forward, and we can't be friends anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I don\'t want to become someone who is dragged by the "pulling force" that Wise talked about.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And neither do I want our friendship to end like this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I took the initiative this time because it seemed like you were trying to be a little difficult. How's that for a mature move?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Bianca can't help but smile a little after hearing Karenina's serious question."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "...You're right. I'm sorry for being such a kid.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fear and her worries were ungrounded from the beginning.'}
{3: "When Bianca reaches out her hand, Karenina reaches out her own and wraps it tightly around Bianca's."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Good. Then I'll give this to you. And no, I'm not taking no for an answer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "What's this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An application form appears in Karenina\'s hand. Bianca takes the file that has Karenina\'s request to be transferred to the Purifying Force as Bianca\'s "regular support."'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You lost many of your members in that mission, right? I believe that I am partly responsible.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I asked around and found out that you've been looking for people to fill those places.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So I recommended myself to the higher-ups. Am I not an amazing friend?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina, I am very grateful for your offer, but you belong to the Engineering Force, so...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's nothing for you to worry about. Have you forgotten what you said to me?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But... if there ever is anything you could help me with—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I will definitely come and ask you for help.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So here I am.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Because we're friends, that's all.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bianca looks at Karenina, whose clear, genuine eyes remind Bianca of the snow that falls in her hometown.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Thank you, Karenina...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca puts her hand to her chest. Something is melting on the inside.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I am sure we will have a great time working together.', 4: '1'}
